newsitem.title: USA: People's Bank sets 3-for-2 stock split.
newsitem.headline: People's Bank sets 3-for-2 stock split.

text.p: People's Bank said Thursday its board has declared a three-for-two stock split, equivalent to an additional half common share for every share held as of May 1.
The stock split is payable on May 15, the company said.

Issued and outstanding shares will increase by 50 percent as a result of the split. As of March 31, its 40.7 million shares oustanding, pre-split, would be equivalent to 61.1 million shares, post-split.
The action to declare a split follows stockholders' approval to increase the company's authorized shares to 100 million from 60 million, it said.
